mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectOrdFrgnrIdtCardEncrtKey Generator(Generator) 2018-04-13 */ ORD_NO , ENCRT_PSNL_KEY FROM ORD_FRGNR_IDT_CARD_ENCRT_KEY WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteOrdFrgnrIdtCardEncrtKey Generator(Generator) 2018-04-13 */ FROM ORD_FRGNR_IDT_CARD_ENCRT_KEY WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
